item.title: dotLOG - Bringing Notepad's Best Kept Secret to VS Code
item.description: Windows Notepad has had a hidden logging trick since 1992 â€” type .LOG as the first line of a file and it automatically appends a timestamp every time you open it. I missed it when I moved to VS Code, so I built dotLOG to bring it back.
